archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.1: One or more Security Operations Centres (SOCs) should be established that perform real-time monitoring and analysis of security-related events to prevent, detect and respond to information security incidents, using a combination of well-defined, up-to-date, approved processes and technologies.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
